title: Track Awesome Serverless Updates Daily
_seo_title: Track Awesome Serverless (pmuens/awesome-serverless) Updates Daily - Track Awesome List
description: DEPRECATED: Curated list of resources related to serverless computing and serverless architectures.

items.content_text:
### Blog posts
